title: raamaa dayajooDavE
sahitya:
rAmA dayajUDavE bhadrAcala rAmA nannu brOvavE 



(rAmA)







anupallavi







rAmA dayajUci rakSinci mamu nElu rAmA raNaranga bhIma



jagadabhi



(rAmA)







caraNam 1







rAjIvadaLa lOcana bhakta parAdhIna bhavamOcana



rAjarAjakula rAjarAjArcita rAjita vaibhava rAja lalAma 



(rAmA)







caraNam 2







tATaka samhAraNamETi kOTi rAkSasa mada haraNa



nITutO shrI rAmakOTi vrAsiti nIku sATilErani sAresAreku



vEDiti 



(rAmA)







caraNam 3







dikku nIvani nammiti nI pAdamula makkuva goni mrokkiti



cikkulu pettaku cinni bhadrAdrlO grakkuna velasina cakkani



sItA 



(rAmA)
